name: milquetoast
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a shy, nervous person with a weak character, usually a man: He changes from a dorky milquetoast to a sexy macho hero. During boxing's bare-knuckle era, gloves were for milquetoasts.
More examplesFewer examplesThose who thought otherwise were derided as milquetoasts.I wasn't going to be a milquetoast and let him steamroller me. He didn't maneuver through Washington's corridors of power by being a milquetoast.

shy, nervous and with a weak character: She was no milquetoast girl. She loved a good confrontation Walter White is a milquetoast teacher whose love of his subject is shared by none of his students.
More examplesFewer examplesJosie breaks off her engagement to milquetoast Ken.In this day and age of milquetoast rock stars, it's refreshing to be repulsed by the old-school guys.She browbeats her milquetoast husband and runs down her adult son.
